Subskills.name: Storm Master
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum amount of storm totems.

Subskills.name: Circuitbreaking
Subskills.description: Increases amount of chain lightning bounces.

Subskills.name: Lightning Rods
Subskills.description: Storm totems call lightning bolts from the sky unleashing lightning pulses dealing increased damage. Storm totems no longer unleash chain lightning.

Subskills.name: Storm Current
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict stasis on hit.

Subskills.name: Storm God
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by storm totem.

Subskills.name: Static Duality
Subskills.description: Chance to summon an additional storm totem on attack for a short period.

Subskills.name: Connected by Storm
Subskills.description: Storm totems are now linked together with electric current dealing damage to monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Static Electroshock
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to targets with stasis.

Subskills.name: Charged Totem
Subskills.description: Storm totem unleashes multiple charged bolts.

Subskills.name: Storming Bolt
Subskills.description: Chance to strike monsters with a bolt of lightning on hit dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Struck by Thunder
Subskills.description: Storm totem has a chance to stun enemies on hit.

Subskills.name: Collapsing Thunder
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Surging Sentry
Subskills.description: Storm totem fires a surge of lightning unleashing lightning pulses on hit.

Subskills.name: Swiftstorm Totem
Subskills.description: Increases the attack speed and damage dealt by storm totem.
